github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use Conventional Commits. Start the title with one of: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, build, ci, chore, revert. Optionally include a scope in parentheses. Then a colon and a single space, then a concise, imperative summary. Example: feat(api): add pagination. After a blank line, include a short bullet list of key changes.
